basics.name: Brian Raymund Abad
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

awards.title: Honors Graduate
awards.summary: Awarded to senior graduates who maintained a cumulative GPA of at least 4.0 with no grades lower than B from Freshman to Senior year.
